name: John Smith
description: John Smith is an American astronaut with a wealth of experience in space exploration. He has completed multiple spacewalks and conducted important research on the International Space Station.

name: Emily Johnson
description: Emily Johnson is a British astronaut known for her work on the European Space Agency's missions. She is passionate about astronomy and has contributed to several important discoveries.

name: Carlos Rodriguez
description: Carlos Rodriguez, a Spanish astronaut, has a background in astrophysics and has conducted experiments related to cosmic radiation. He's a key member of the European space program.

name: Shidoshi Tanaka
description: Shidoshi Tanaka is a Japanese astronaut known for his expertise in life sciences. He has conducted experiments on the effects of microgravity on biological systems.

name: Sophie Dubois
description: Sophie Dubois, a French astronaut, is an expert in space engineering. She has played a crucial role in the development of advanced propulsion systems for space exploration.

name: Janusz Nosacz
description: Janusz Nosacz is a Polish astronaut known for his contributions to space robotics. He has operated and maintained robotic systems on the International Space Station.

name: Li Wei
description: Li Wei is a Chinese astronaut with expertise in planetary science. He has participated in missions to study Mars and the outer planets of the solar system.

name: Megan Brown
description: Megan Brown is a Canadian astronaut known for her work on space station maintenance. She has conducted numerous spacewalks to ensure the station's functionality.
